name: mysql-updated
content:
version: '3'
services:
  mysql:
    image: mysql:8.0
    container_name: mysql-server
    restart: always
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: newpassword123
      MYSQL_DATABASE: new_app_db
      MYSQL_USER: new_app_user
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: new_app_pass
    ports:
      - "3307:3306"
    volumes:
      - mysql_data:/var/lib/mysql
    command: --default-authentication-plugin=mysql_native_password
volumes:
  mysql_data:
